title: The Drought : Digital Storytelling project
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions

abstract: Ten stories by farmers from north-eastern Victoria.
description: Ten farmers from the north-eastern region of Victoria reflect upon their lives within the context of one of the longest and most severe droughts the region has ever seen. In doing so, they highlight the things that have kept them there, whether it be family, community or the love of farming.
